description: Claims data for various injuries, detailing claimant information, treatment specifics, and claim status. This dataset supports the management and analysis of workers' compensation and auto insurance claims.

metadata.description: Unique identifier for each claim; Represents the specific claim being processed.
Identifier for the source record associated with the claim; Used for tracking the origin of the claim.
Type of insurance coverage applicable to the claim; Indicates the nature of the insurance.
First name of the individual filing the claim.
Middle initial of the claimant; Provides additional identification for the claimant.
Last name of the claimant; Essential for identifying the individual involved in the claim.
Full name of the claimant; Combines first, middle initial, and last name for complete identification.
Description of the claim; Summarizes the nature of the injury or incident leading to the claim.
Social Security Number of the claimant; Used for identification purposes.
Date when the injury occurred; Format is YYYY-MM-DD.
Date when the claim was filed; Format is YYYY-MM-DD.
Current status of the claim; Indicates whether the claim is Open, Closed, or in another state.
Total monetary amount claimed for the injury or incident.
Type of claim being filed; Indicates the nature of the claim such as Medical or Disability.
Name of the employer associated with the claimant.
Street address of the employer; Provides the location of the employer's business.
City where the employer is located.
State where the employer operates.
Postal code for the employer's address.
Name of the insurance adjuster handling the claim.
Phone number of the claims adjuster handling the claim.
Email address of the claims adjuster for communication regarding the claim.
Name of the doctor providing treatment related to the claim.
Phone number of the doctor for contact regarding the treatment.
Email address of the doctor treating the claimant.
Name of the hospital where the claimant received treatment.
Physical address of the hospital providing care to the claimant.
City where the hospital is located.
State where the hospital is located; Represents the two-letter state abbreviation.
Postal code for the hospital's location; Indicates the specific area within the state.
Date when the treatment was administered; Format is YYYY-MM-DD.
Type of treatment received; Describes the medical procedure performed.
Type of disability resulting from the claim; Indicates whether the disability is temporary or permanent.
Date when the disability began; Format is YYYY-MM-DD.
Date when the disability ended or is expected to end; Format is YYYY-MM-DD.
Total amount of benefits awarded to the claimant; Represented as a monetary value.
Phone number of the claimant for communication regarding the claim.
Email address of the claimant for electronic correspondence.
Residential address of the claimant, providing details for correspondence.
City where the claimant resides, part of their address information.
State where the claimant resides; Indicates the state of the claimant's address.
Postal code of the claimant's address; Used for mail delivery and location identification.
Specific body part affected by the injury; Identifies the area of the injury.
Nature of the injury; Describes the type of injury sustained by the claimant.
The reason for the injury or claim; Describes the specific incident that led to the claim.
